title: Best Skin Concept Ever: Reverse Kled
body: Kled wears a dinosaur suit, Skaarl wears people clothes, but best of it all, when in mounted formation Kled carries Skaarl, who wields the axe.

replies.body: Awwweh!  I love this idea.  Too cute ^-^

or Skaarl grew some balls and said "its your turn on bottom now *****, i run this"


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
